thread.title: Dervla Moore
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Dervla Moore

author: Dervla Moore
title: Dervla Moore
text: The service recieved was excellent from when ordered online in grafton street store to when was delivered , especially from assistant Amy in Blanchardstown store who contacted me after her working day to let me know the jacket arrived . Fantastic customer service .
